daily_fact: New York City's Second Avenue subway stations, which opened in 2017, continue to enhance transportation options and accessibility for residents, showcasing the city's commitment to infrastructure improvement and community connectivity.
topline_md: Recent updates in New York City include a fire injuring six at a Bronx housing complex, eight hospitalized from a carbon monoxide leak in Brooklyn, and ongoing concerns about highly pathogenic avian influenza as well as a significant fentanyl seizure in the Bronx.

risks_alerts.title: Risks & Alerts
